result.execSummary:
The defendant John Lancin Brautigam was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Theft-Movable Property <=$2500, a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.20(1)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Fine and DNA surcharge are to be paid at $50 per month commencing 06-01-2016 and the 1st of each month thereafter until paid in full or serve 15 days jail as penalty for failure to pay.
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. John Lancin Brautigam

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.
Order for reimbursement of GAL or Attorney

records.addlTxt: Affidavit of Services for Court appointed counsel and billing statement, received and filed, by Atty Sonderhouse.
with Elements of criminal offenses to which plea is being entered.

District Attorney's Office Law Intern, Kelly Pingel appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Defendant John Lancin Brautigam in court with attorney Ronald James Sonderhouse.

Defendant enters a plea of Guilty to the charge.
Court finds the defendant Guilty of the charge.

Court orders the following:
Fine: $578
DNA Sample and Surcharge:  $200
Defendant to provide DNA sample, if not yet provided, immediately if in custody otherwise within (3) business days at the Waukesha County Sheriff Department.
To be paid at the rate of $50 per month, starting 06/01/16 and the 1st of every month until paid in full.
Alternate: 15 Days in the Waukesha County Jail.
Plea/sentencing hearing on April 28, 2016 at 02:00 pm.
